passage_text: summary as the founder and ceo of ashoka innovators for the public bill drayton has pioneered the field of social entrepreneurship growing a global association of nearly 3000 leading social entrepreneurs who work together to create an everyone a changemaker world from 1977 to 1981 mr drayton served as assistant administrator at the u s environmental protection agency where he launched emissions trading the basis of the kyoto protocol and other reforms

drayton area historical tornado activity is slightly below north dakota state average it is 45 % smaller than the overall u s average on 6 6 1999 a category f4 max wind speeds 207 260 mph tornado 27 6 miles away from the drayton city center caused $ 1 million in damages colleges universities with over 2000 students nearest to drayton university of north dakota about 45 miles grand forks nd full time enrollment 12858 northland community and technical college about 56 miles thief river falls mn ft enrollment 2717

the route of the abandoned wilts berks canal passes through the northwest of drayton parish about 1 mile 1 6 km northwest of the village building had begun in 1796 at semington junction in wiltshire and reached west challow in 1807 the oldest parts of drayton s current manor house are 15th century a wing was added in the 18th century and the front is early 20th century the house is a grade ii listed building

drayton north dakota is located on the red river of the north between grand forks and the canadian border at the intersection of interstate 29 and nd state highway 66 mn state highway 11 drayton is at an important trade crossroad for freight transportation and tourism our new web site is under construction

background as the founder and ceo of ashoka innovators for the public bill drayton has pioneered the field of social entrepreneurship growing a global association of nearly 3000 leading social entrepreneurs who work together to create an everyone a changemaker world from 1977 to 1981 mr drayton served as assistant administrator at the u s environmental protection agency where he launched emissions trading the basis of the kyoto protocol and other reforms

the earliest known forms of drayton s toponym are the old english draegtune drægtune and draigtun from the 10th century it evolved through draitune in the 10th and 11th centuries draitun from the 11th to the 13th century and drettun in the 12th century the oldest parts of drayton s current manor house are 15th century a wing was added in the 18th century and the front is early 20th century the house is a grade ii listed building
